heading: ux research study
description: A research study for an online whisky shop I conducted for the milestone project in the Udacity UX Design Course.

heading: balsamiq
description: Wireframes made with the low fidelity mockup tool Balsamiq. They were made for a static website frontend development project in the bootcamp at Code Institute.

heading: figma
description: I used Figma to create the desktop wireframes for this portfolio. The website itself and my GitHub pages demonstrate my skills in HTML, SCSS and JavaScript.

heading: paradox
description:
The little girl standing in the archway and the woman to the right in the background are the same person.

With Object Selection and the Lasso tool, I have isolated the background in the picture with the little girl, putting extra effort into the details in the iron gate. I then replaced the background with the picture of the two women to create the illusion of a paradox.
